tool_description: IDfy’s Data Extraction Solutions allow you to extract and digitise text fields from images of standard documents in real-time.
name: Document Data Extraction Solutions
title: Document Data Extraction Solutions

api_list.name: Indian Driving License Data Extraction
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an indian driving license in real-time. You can additionally send more details in the request to perform a name match with the extracted fields.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://document-data-extraction-solutions.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_driving_license"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-data-extraction-solutions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Indian Pan Card Data Extraction
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an individual or company PAN card in real-time. You can additionally send more details in the request to perform a name match with the extracted fields.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://document-data-extraction-solutions.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_pan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-data-extraction-solutions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
